name: QuerySuggestedImages
description: This API will fetch untagged images filtered by suggested tags Ids. It returns an empty array if no images are found.

iterationId.description: IterationId to use for the suggested tags and regions.

body.description: Contains properties we need to query suggested images.

$block: The array of result images and token containing session and continuation Ids for the next query.

$ul: **results**: Result of a suggested tags and regions request of the untagged image.
**token**: Contains properties we need to fetch suggested tags for. For the first call, Session and continuation set to null.
**continuation**: Continuation Id for database pagination. Initially null but later used to paginate.
**maxCount**: Maximum number of results you want to be returned in the response.
**session**: SessionId for database query. Initially set to null but later used to paginate.
**sortBy**: OrderBy. Ordering mechanism for your results.
**tagIds**: Existing TagIds in project to filter suggested tags on.
**threshold**: Confidence threshold to filter suggested tags on.
**message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
